stories.Title: Find bugs in ChatGPT and get $20,000
stories.Description: A commitment to safety is evident through OpenAI's new "Bug Bounty program", which rewards people for finding bugs with amounts ranging from $200 to $20,000.
stories.Tweet: Find bugs in ChatGPT and get $20,000 📦 A commitment to safety is evident through OpenAI's new "Bug Bounty program", which rewards people for finding bugs with amounts ranging from $200 to $20,000. # https://openai.com/blog/bug-bounty-program

stories.Title: AI-Generated music is a threat to copyright
stories.Description: As developers train AI technology with artists' music catalogs, streaming services receive takedown requests from Universal Music Group.
stories.Tweet: AI-Generated music is a threat to copyright 📦 As developers train AI technology with artists' music catalogs, streaming services receive takedown requests from Universal Music Group. # https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2023/04/streaming-services-urged-to-clamp-down-on-ai-generated-music/

stories.Title: Twitter is coming up with an AI project
stories.Description: According to reports, Elon Musk purchased 10,000 GPUs for Twitter's data centers, signaling his commitment to the company's in-house AI project.
stories.Tweet: Twitter is coming up with an AI project 📦 According to reports, Elon Musk purchased 10,000 GPUs for Twitter's data centers, signaling his commitment to the company's in-house AI project. # https://www.engadget.com/elon-musk-reportedly-bought-thousands-of-gpus-for-a-twitter-ai-project-214535382.html

stories.Title: Chatbots have a thirst for water
stories.Description: A new study has revealed that chatbot training has a significant impact on the environment, as it requires an unexpectedly high amount of water, raising concerns about sustainability.
stories.Tweet: Chatbots have a thirst for water 📦 A new study has revealed that chatbot training has a significant impact on the environment, as it requires an unexpectedly high amount of water, raising concerns about sustainability. # https://gizmodo.com/chatgpt-ai-water-185000-gallons-training-nuclear-1850324249

stories.Title: Meta's new challenges
stories.Description: On the so-called "year of efficiency" declared by CEO Mark Zuckerberg, the company has been dealing with significant layoffs, concerns about the potential of the metaverse, and other struggles.
stories.Tweet: Meta's new challenges 📦 On the so-called "year of efficiency" declared by CEO Mark Zuckerberg, the company has been dealing with significant layoffs, concerns about the potential of the metaverse, and other struggles. # https://www.globalvillagespace.com/tech/morale-crisis-at-meta-due-to-layoffs-and-absent-bosses/

stories.Title: The benefits of PowerShell
stories.Description: In case you're thinking about using PowerShell, here's everything you need to know.

stories.Title: Databricks unveils Dolly 2.0
stories.Description: Dolly 2.0 it's the first open-source, instruction-following LLM. And the best part? It's now available for commercial use without any payment or data-sharing requirements.
stories.Tweet: Databricks unveils Dolly 2.0 📦 Dolly 2.0 it's the first open-source, instruction-following LLM. And the best part? It's now available for commercial use without any payment or data-sharing requirements. # https://www.databricks.com/blog/2023/04/12/dolly-first-open-commercially-viable-instruction-tuned-llm

stories.Title: Wolverine: The “regenerative” AI program
stories.Description: Until you get it right, this program will keep running and fixing errors in your code while explaining what went wrong.
stories.Tweet: Wolverine: The “regenerative” AI program 📦 Until you get it right, this program will keep running and fixing errors in your code while explaining what went wrong. # https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2023/04/developer-creates-self-healing-programs-that-fix-themselves-thanks-to-gpt-4/

stories.Title: Hyundai Motor Group announces investment in EV Industry
stories.Description: In a similar move to Kia, Hyundai plans to invest $18 billion in South Korea's electric vehicle industry through 2030.
stories.Tweet: Hyundai Motor Group announces investment in EV Industry 📦 In a similar move to Kia, Hyundai plans to invest $18 billion in South Korea's electric vehicle industry through 2030. # https://techcrunch.com/2023/04/11/hyundai-motor-to-invest-18b-in-south-koreas-evs-by-2030/

stories.Title: Artemis 2 upper stage is ready for tests
stories.Description: NASA's Artemis 2 mission is getting closer to its goal of reaching the moon, with pre-flight testing currently underway for the upper stage of the Space Launch System in Cape Canaveral.
stories.Tweet: Artemis 2 upper stage is ready for tests 📦 NASA's Artemis 2 mission is getting closer to its goal of reaching the moon, with pre-flight testing currently underway for the upper stage of the Space Launch System in Cape Canaveral. # https://gizmodo.com/upper-stage-nasa-artemis-sls-megarocket-ready-tests-1850324870

stories.Title: Twitter is no longer a company
stories.Description: A document has revealed that Twitter merged into a company named X Corp, as Elon Musk works on creating his own "everything" app, similar to China's WeChat.
stories.Tweet: Twitter is no longer a company 📦 A document has revealed that Twitter merged into a company named X Corp, as Elon Musk works on creating his own "everything" app, similar to China's WeChat. # https://www.businessinsider.com/elon-musk-x-everything-app-twitter-details-2022-10
